parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Joins ''array'' into [[String]] with provided ''separator''. Array can be of mixed types, all elements will be converted to [[String]] prior to joining, but the fastest operation is on the array of [[Strings]].</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> array '''joinString''' separator </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]] - array of [[Anything]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> separator: [[String]] - separator used to join array elements. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_str = "- This, is a sample string." [[splitString]] "-,. "; // ["This","is","a","sample","string"]
_str [[joinString]] " "; // "This is a sample string"</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>["This","is","sparta"] [[joinString]] " ~ "; // "This ~ is ~ sparta"</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>["1",2,[[text]] "3"] [[joinString]] ""; // "123"</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>"Japa is the best!" [[splitString]] "" [[joinString]] " "; // "J a p a   i s   t h e   b e s t !"</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> Remove all \r\n from file:<code>[[loadFile]] "somefile.txt" [[splitString]] [[toString]] [13,10] [[joinString]] " "</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE5</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[splitString]], [[set]], [[resize]], [[reverse]], [[select]], [[in]], [[find]], [[toArray]], [[forEach]], [[count]], [[deleteAt]], [[deleteRange]], [[append]], [[sort]], [[param]], [[params]], [[arrayIntersect]], [[toString]], [[endl]], [http://www.utf8-chartable.de/ Unicode Character Table] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
